instruction: Identify three elements that make a good advertisement.
output: Three key elements that make a good advertisement are creative messaging, appealing visuals, and target audience. Creative messaging should be concise yet impactful, conveying the desired message in an engaging and memorable way. Visuals should be eye catching and should capture the attention of the intended audience. Finally, ads should always be tailored to the target audience, as this helps to ensure the message will resonate with the desired demographic.
